name: Onlinemenukaart
author: Blue Indigo Solutions

sections.description:
Onlinemenukaart is a SaaS that allows you to create a menu card for your business. With this plugin, you’ll be able to display the menucard on your WordPress website.

Features

  • Automatically connect your Onlinemenukaart account with your WordPress site
  • Gutenberg Block
  • Shortcodes

More information about Onlinemenukaart can be found on our website.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload onlinemenukaart folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to the Onlinemenukaart settings page and follow the instructions.
sections.faq:
Is Onlinemenukaart a free service?

To use the full capacity of this plugin, a paid subscription is needed.
